gr.interamerican.bo2.creation.resolvers
Class PackagesNameResolver

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.creation.resolvers.PackagesNameResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
NameResolver
public class PackagesNameResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements NameResolver

Implementation of NameResolver. This implementation expects that interfaces are placed inside a package structure that has a def package in its root. Implementations of the interfaces are placed inside an identical package structure that has an impl package in its root. Additionally the implementation classes always have the Impl suffix.
The interface com.foo.def.Person is implemented by the class com.foo.impl.PersonImpl.
The interface com.foo.def.domain.Address is implemented by the class com.foo.impl.domain.AddressImpl.

Method Detail

getImplementationName

public java.lang.String getImplementationName(java.lang.String interfaceName)
Description copied from interface: NameResolver
It resolves an Implementation class name to an Interface class name. The implementation type is generated by replacing the def package of the interface with the impl package and by adding an Impl postfix. Example: com.foo.def.SomeType resolves to com.foo.impl.SomeTypeImpl. If the interface name does not include the interface package, then the the method will return the interface name.

Specified by:
getImplementationName in interface NameResolver
Parameters:
interfaceName - the interface class name
Returns:
the implementation class name

getDeclarationName

public java.lang.String getDeclarationName(java.lang.String implementationName)
Description copied from interface: NameResolver
It resolves an Interface class name to an Implementation class name. The implementation type is generated by replacing the def package of the interface with the impl package and by adding an Impl postfix. So in order to resolve the interface name, the process is reversed. Example: com.foo.impl.SomeTypeImpl resolves to com.foo.def.SomeType.

Specified by:
getDeclarationName in interface NameResolver
Parameters:
implementationName - the implementation class name
Returns:
the interface class name
